data.title: Agnellis’ Exor Teams Up to Invest in Teen Fashion Brand Subdued
data.meta_description: Investors including Italy’s billionaire Agnelli family bought a stake in women’s fashion brand Subdued, a trendy favorite among Italian teens.
data.text:
Investors including Italy’s billionaire Agnelli family bought a stake in women’s fashion brand Subdued, a trendy favorite among Italian teens.

NUO, an established partnership between the Agnelli’s Exor NV and Hong Kong family office World-Wide Investment Company Limited, said in a statement Tuesday that it purchased 30% of Osit Impresa SpA, which operates under the Subdued brand. No financial figures were provided.
